item.title: Petrolia Energy Corp 10-K
item.description: Petrolia Energy Corp, which is in the Crude Petroleum & Natural Gas [1311] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 27, 2021 had 30930 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 000 - 464 instances company - 435 instances stock - 364 instances shares - 325 instances common - 302 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
